title: Blueprint, "Coudert Nast Apartment: Sideboard", 1929–30s
markings: Stamp in red ink on verso: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso, center right and upper left: NAST DINING ROOM; inscribed on front, lower right: 2 shelves at each end/ (pei. E.T.O (?) )/Red, black lacquer only/10 bars (per) chromium/plate; lower center: SIDE BOARD FOR/MR. COUDERT NAST/DESIGNED BY/DONALD DESKEY; inscribed with materials.
description: Plan and elevations for dining room sideboard for the Coudert Nast apartment. Black lacquer body of side board with three horizontal brushed chrome metal strips on each side near top. Center section of sideboard in different material and taller than sides. Two vertical brushed chrome strips on left and right side of center section. Left and right sides of sideboard rounded.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Coudert Nast Apartment: Sideboard", 1929–30s.
1929–30s. Blueprint on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-462.
